reviewText: Rip off. The leap frog ABC's were great.  With this computer generated production they tried to pull a fast one.  It is a waste of money.

This product is educational, as well as entertaining. My children really enjoyed it, but I like how I can be confident that they are learning as well as having fun.  The morphing of animals into words is a visible way for children to begin to assosiate that letters come together and represent words. I wonder if my children aren't soaking up more of it than I know, with their reading skills in whole word recognition. I actually was entertained myself with the facts that are shared in fun voices from each animal.
